h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Before continuing along the main path, break open the wooden fence behind the pill containers, and you'll find an alternate path.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Outside the Wheel'.
The content is as follows:
Before continuing along the main path, break open the wooden fence behind the pill containers, and you'll find an alternate path.
